PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-13662005-08-08,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActDepartment of Transport Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of ERIC JOHN HARRIS, Q.C., of Vancouver, British Columbia, KENNETH FREEMAN DOBELL of Delta, British Columbia, and RANDOLPH KERRY MORRISS of Ottawa, Ontario, collectively known as the Task Force, to inquire into the issues underlying the disruption and report on long-term improvements to that part of the national transportation system relating to the movement of containers into and out of ports in the Lower Mainland of British Columbia, that would prevent the disruption of the movement containers and maintain the efficiency and effectiveness of the national transportation system, to hold office during pleasure, for a term ending October 27, 2005.
AttachmentsAttachment
